participant_1.background:
My inspirations are alexander mcqueen and coco chanel.

I love to go shopping and inspire myself in stylish stores.
Since young i ve loved fashion.

participant_2.background:
I am a dancer.
I can play the piano.
I am a vegetarian.
I love to sing.

content.text: What's your favorite type of music to dance to?
I love to dance to all types of music, but I especially love dancing to hip-hop and R&B.
I love hip-hop too! Do you like to go to concerts?
I love going to concerts! I've been to a few really great ones recently.
That's awesome! What was your favorite concert that you went to?
My favorite concert was probably the one I went to for Khalid. He's such a talented artist and it was an amazing show.
I've heard really good things about Khalid. I'll have to check him out.
You definitely should! He's one of my favorite artists right now.
So, what other things do you like to do for fun?
I love to sing! I've been taking vocal lessons for a few years now and I'm really enjoying it.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to take vocal lessons, but I've never had the time.
You should definitely try it! It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to express yourself.
Thanks for the advice! I'll definitely look into it.
No problem!
So, what else do you like to do?
I love to go shopping! I'm always looking for new clothes and accessories.
Me too! I love fashion and I'm always trying to stay up-to-date on the latest trends.
I'm the same way! I love finding new pieces that I can add to my wardrobe.
So, what's your favorite style of fashion?
I love all types of fashion, but I'm especially into the current trend of wearing oversized clothing.
I love oversized clothing too! It's so comfortable and it looks really cool.
I know, right? It's the perfect style for me.
So, what's your favorite fashion designer?
I love Alexander McQueen and Coco Chanel! They're both such amazing designers and their work is always so inspiring.
I love Alexander McQueen too! He's one of my favorite designers.
He's so talented! I love his use of color and his sense of drama.
I know, right? He's such an original artist.
I agree! He's one of a kind.
